display_long_description:
VR Sniper immerses players in an immersive world with a realistic shooting experience. As a sniper armed with a variety of weapons, players take on missions in three different atmospheres: city, oil field and neighborhood. The game takes place on three-dimensional maps filled with main missions, side missions and challenges.

Each mission has its own unique scenario. Main missions are in-depth story missions that immerse the player in the game world. Side quests offer the opportunity to earn additional rewards and help players diversify their skills. Each of the missions offers a challenging and satisfying shooter experience, with unique target placement and movement patterns. As you hit targets, you can earn coins, which can be used to unlock new weapons, upgrade existing weapons and take on more challenging missions. 

This game offers variety with a choice of three different maps: a vibrant city environment, a mysterious oil field, and a quiet neighborhood. Each map is unique in terms of visual variety and game mechanics, encouraging players to experiment with different tactics.
